name: Time Invaders
description:
Lore

Dark, other-timely creatures have invaded earth. They might have time on their side, but so do you! Use your experimental Time Hook to aid you in warping your way through the invasion. The clock is ticking, so start rewinding!

Controls Move
WASD / ArrowsBombE
Time Hook
Q About

This is a game made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2 - A week long game with 'Rewind' as the theme.

Credits

Programming, GUI

Programming
